text:
Valagaiman is a one of the great taluk of thiruvarur..
Once upon a Time this valagaiman taluk is in thanjavur district..
Then it is in Thiruvarur district...
And the present that valagaiman taluk is to move of a new district of kumbakonam...
Valagaiman taluk is have a beautiful & great cities & villages...
Avoor is the great example of that villages...
